p: We explore the joint pdf in the second term of Eq. ( 11) using MCMC. For the MCMC, we use 2,000,000 samples with a burn-in of 100,000 for all experiments. Following the cross-validation experiment, we use f = 3.0 for all experiments. We run a second run of the NSIDC_r91_40p.nat experiment with a different random seed, and the diagnostics from the two runs are reasonably similar.
